file_content.text: Never satisfied! Now the big guy wants a sarlacc! How am I supposed to move one of those?
Ah, is this my favorite mercenary, returning with a rancor egg for Nem'ro?
Take it.
So much bloodshed, so much fun!
This was great.
What do you think? I fulfill my commitments.
As promised.
Take it before it hatches!
This thing scares me.
Oh, did you see it crack? This is so exciting.
Heh. This'll make the big guy plenty happy, which makes me happy, so I can make you happy. Here's your pay, and good work.
Did you expect anything less?
Are you surprised?
No, I guess I didn't. Thanks again.
Got any other jobs?
No, thank you. This is gonna make for one very happy Hutt!
Next time do your own dirty work.
Don't bother calling me again.
Look, you do the job, you take the pay, you don't complain 'bout it being dirty. Everyone's got to get ahead, one way or another.
No egg, no pay.
Hey, you, I understand you been workin' for Nem'ro. I mean, I've seen you comin' in an' out of this place often enough.
So am I right or am I wrong? Are you working for the big guy?
That's what I've been doing.
Yeah.
I do Nem'ro's killing for him.
Here and there.
I like your style.
You seem to know a lot about me, but I don't know a thing about you.
Who are you?
We all do what we have to. Times are tough.
Not by choice.
Heh. Most people don't have a choice, but that's the big guy for you.
Name's Urgrec. You might've heard about Nem'ro's little menagerie in the beast pens down beneath. I'm the guy who keeps the beast pens stocked.
Thought you might be int'rested in a little business proposition. Help me, help Nem'ro, help yourself a little in the process. But it'll take strength--and guts.
What do you need?
Good.
Hurry it up.
The big guy wants a rancor. All the big-time Hutts have 'em. Nem'ro wants one. You're gonna get him one.
I know you're thinkin'--a rancor! How's somebody gonna snare a rancor? Seven meters tall, capable of swallowing a person in a single gulp!
Well, don't you worry. I got it all figured out.
The only thing I'm worried about is the pay.
Let's talk money.
What? Think Nem'ro can't pay for what he wants? 'Course he can! Top price for one rancor--or rancor egg, actually.
Sounds fun.
Then you'll be perfect for the job.
Should I be worried?
Stick with me, here.
Fa'athra's no-good beast tamer's already procured a rancor egg. Now we can't have that egg hatchin', and Fa'athra gettin' a full-grown rancor before Nem'ro.
I need someone to steal that egg, and destroy the eggs of his other creatures--teach that beast tamer a lesson. Can you handle it?
I never turn down a chance at pay.
Hey, there's money.
Great. I thought you'd go for it--you have that telling glint in your eye. There is just, uh, one more little thing you should know.
The egg is in the back of Fa'athra's beast chambers.
Meaning, you'll have to do a bit of fighting to get it. But nothing you can't handle, right? Good luck!
Sure.
Nem'ro can get his own rancor.
No way. [Refuse quest]
Oh well.
You're off the hook this time, but Nem'ro won't be happy without his rancor egg--which means all of us suffer.
The big guy's got me pretty busy these days.
